recipes.title: Chickpea Curry
instructions: Heat a skillet or pan and add the olive oil.
Then add the chickpeas and curry powder; saut√© for 2-3 minutes.
Add the coconut yogurt, tomatoes, nutritional yeast, lime juice, and salt.
Stir and simmer for 5-10 minutes.
Add the spinach and stir for 1-2 minutes.
Season with salt & pepper to taste.
Serve over quinoa or brown rice.

recipes.title: Banana Pancakes
instructions: Blend the ingredients in a blender.
Cook pancakes on the stove over medium heat.

recipes.title: Almond Flour Bread
instructions: Mix the dry ingredients together.
Mix the wet ingredients together.
Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and stir until combined.
Bake at 350 in a 9-inch diameter pan for 25 minutes (or until top is golden).
Let cool for ~15 minutes.

recipes.title: Sweet Potato Salad
instructions: Cut the sweet potatoes into bite-sized pieces and cook them in a pan with olive oil.
Add the spinach, red onion, apple cider vinegar, lemon juice, and avocado to a bowl.
When the sweet potatoes are cool, add them to the bowl with salt & pepper to taste.

recipes.title: Lemon Muffins
instructions: Add the dry ingredients to a bowl and mix.
Add the wet ingredients to another bowl and mix.
Add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients and stir until smooth.
Bake for 20-25 minutes at 350 degrees.

recipes.title: Almond Flour Biscuit
instructions: Mix the ingredients in a small bowl.
Microwave for 2 minutes.
Remove the biscuit from the bowl, then place it in a pan over medium heat.
Cook each side until golden.
